snippet: The squad car was traveling north on Broadway when the man, 69, stepped into its path between 77th and 78th Street, the Police Department said.
abstract: Pedestrian is seriously injured when he is struck by a New York City police car on the Upper West Side; squad car was traveling north on Broadway when the man stepped into its path between 77th and 78th Streets; police say car had the right of way; officers in car are not injured.

byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and Daniel E. Slotnik contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The squad car was traveling north on Broadway when the man, 69, stepped into its path between 77th and 78th Street, the Police Department said.

headline.main: Pedestrian Seriously Injured by Police Car
headline.print_headline: Pedestrian Seriously Injured by Police Car
